forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
